author: cnbc.com
title: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. is Investigating the Board of Directors of Microsemi Corporation (MSCC) on Behalf of Stockholders and Encourages Investors to Contact the Firm
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. is investigating potential claims on behalf of Microsemi Corporation (NASDAQ:MSCC) stockholders concerning the proposed acquisition of the company by Microchip Technology Incorporated (NASDAQ: MCHP).
Our investigation concerns whether Microsemiâ€™s board of directors failed to adequately shop the company and obtain the best possible value for its stockholders before entering into a definitive merger agreement with Microchip Technology. Under the terms of the agreement, Microsemi stockholders will receive $68.78 per share in cash for each share of Microsemi common stock that they own.
If you own Microsemi shares, have information, would like to learn more about these claims, or have any questions concerning this announcement or your rights or interests with respect to these matters, please contact Brandon Walker or Melissa Fortunato by email at investigations@bespc.com , or telephone at (212) 355-4648, or by filling out this contact form . There is no cost or obligation to you.
Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. is a New York-based law firm concentrating in commercial and securities litigation. For additional information concerning our investigation of Microsemi Corporation, please go to http://www.bespc.com/mscc . For additional information about Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C., please go to www.bespc.com .
